author: Staff Reporter
text:
An impressive parade by Armed Reserve Police personnel marked the conclusion of the annual mobilisation camp or the refresher training programme at the Armed Reserve Grounds here on Thursday.

The camp that began on January 18 is to relieve the stress in the personnel and help them maintain their physique. Physical training, unarmed combat, yoga, handling weapons, mob operation, providing first aid, stress and anger management were provided at the camp.

Superintendent of Police S.R. Senthil Kumar inspected the guard of honour.Senior police officers said that the refresher training programmes would help them upgrade their skills.

A. Sitrarasu, Inspector, Armed Guards and other officials were present.
title: Mobilisation camp concludes
